entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Barrie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:45 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lake Simcoe Regional Airport 1:00 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
Temperature: 1.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 97 %
Dewpoint: 0.6°C
Wind: E 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 1

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Risk of freezing rain over higher terrain late this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating late this afternoon. Amount 5 mm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain or snow. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Rain changing to snow or ice pellets after midnight. Risk of freezing rain this evening and overnight. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this evening. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the morning. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
